CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Premier Financial Corp is a financial holding company that operates as a community banking and financial services corporation. It offers a broad range of financial services through its subsidiaries including checking accounts, savings accounts, certificates of deposit, real estate mortgage loans, commercial loans, consumer loans, home equity loans, and trust and wealth management services.
